item.description:
Hey everyone!

We're in the thick of summer, so let's get together and enjoy a day trip to the Boston Harbor Islands! Located just a short ferry ride away from the city, it's a perfect place to have a fun, relaxing day in the sun. There's places to go hiking, swimming, play frisbee and have a picnic.

We will take a ferry from the Long Wharf-North pier to Spectacle Island. Ferrys run hourly from the pier and a round-trip ticket is $14.

For more information:
http://bostonharborislands.org/spectacle
http://bostonharborislands.org/getting-here

 

On a small personal note: as many of you are aware, I am moving to Japan on July 30th. So I would really love to see as many of you come out as possible! I'd love to create a wonderful memory with this group that I can take with me as I go. :)
item.how_to_find_us: Take the blue line to Aquarium Station. From there, the Long Wharf-North pier should be a short walk away. We will meet in front of the ticketing area.
item.name: Day Trip to the Boston Harbor Islands!
